title: Hülkenberg was 'in denial' about first F1 podium in British GP
summary: Hülkenberg went from almost last to third in the British Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved their first Formula 1 podium at the British Grand Prix?
What position did Hülkenberg start from in the British Grand Prix before finishing third?
In which year did the British Grand Prix take place where Hülkenberg finished third?
